snippet: With Buffalo off to its worst start in franchise history, the general manager and the coach were fired, and Pat LaFontaine and Ted Nolan were hired.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Buffalo Sabres owner Terry Pegula fires general manager Darcy Regier and rookie coach Ron Rolston; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: With Buffalo off to its worst start in franchise history, the general manager and the coach were fired, and Pat LaFontaine and Ted Nolan were hired.

headline.main: LaFontaine and Nolan Returning to Buffalo
headline.print_headline: LaFontaine And Nolan Returning To Buffalo
